document_data.title: Into the Fallen Lands
document_data.mainbody: '''''Into the Fallen Lands''''' is an adventure module from the RPGA ''[[Legacy of the Green Regent]]'' campaign. It was never published or released to the public, so few details are known.
document_data.Plot:
The party is employed by the [[Beutaleen'dal]] family of [[moon elf|moon elves]] of [[Loudwater]] to recover an heirloom lost in the [[Fallen Lands]].<ref>
{{-}}
